title: Textile, ca. 1835
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 106cm (41 3/4in.)
Weft: 73 cm (23 3/4in.) (Edges cut.)
Height of repeat : 47 cm
description: Country scenes; an amorous couple, people fishing from a boat, and two girls reading a letter, in a diamond lattice grid of leaves and flowers. in purple on white.
